name: WarriOrb
detailed_description:
Follow WarriOrb Progress:

Discord Channel

Twitter


About the Game

Demons! Giants! Mutants! A talking Ball with hybrid limbs?! In WarriOrb you play as a mighty demon trapped in an unlikely body. The path ahead is not an easy one... Are you ready to do whatever it takes to regain your freedom?

Key Features:

  • Bounce and roll your way towards freedom


    Use your newly acquired ball-like abilities to wander around, but keep your wits about you - the dangers of the Decaying World can take many forms. Bottomless pits, toxic steams, boiling lava... just to name a few.

  • Fight your way out of the unpleasant situations


    Improvise, adapt and overcome - understanding your enemies is the key. Choosing the proper weapons and spells to use and being conscious about your moves will get you out alive from the unfriendly encounters.

  • Explore a once-flourishing world before the decay prevails


    The Ruined Realm hides many secret locations and long forgotten treasures for those who are worthy enough to find them. Collect weapons, clothes, spells, and anything else you consider capable of easing your journey.

  • 2D Side-Scroller? 3D Spline-Scroller!

    In WarriOrb the player moves in a 2D side-scroller way on curly paths and crossroads exploring a full 3D environment. The reason you might feel like running around in circles is because you are literally running around in circles, be careful about that.

  • Solve puzzles – they can’t be that complicated, right?


    What does not kill you can still stand in your way, but at least the time spent on thinking is not time spent on dying. Most of the logical puzzles are lightsome, but you might need to stop for a few seconds to figure them out.

  • Talk to the inhabitants

    You will meet other more or less intelligent creatures on your way. Some of them will need your help, some of them will help you out.

  • Overcome the desperate situation


    Being summoned to another world and forced into a physical body is never a pleasant experience. The fact that you find yourself imprisoned inside a ball does not help the situation, either. Using your enthralling powers you manage to shape the body into a better form – having two limbs is better than having none after all, right? You also create a pair of eyes to have a better look at your situation – it is even worse than you expected. Not remembering anything from your previous life might be a blessing at this point.

  • Dress according to the occasion


    The clothes you wear and the weapons you use have a huge "gameplay impact", but there is no ultimate equipment - different situations require different outfits. If you are brave (or foolish) enough you can just ignore that and wear whatever you prefer, like any true hero would.

short_description: Demons! Giants! Mutants! A talking Ball with hybrid limbs?! In WarriOrb you play as a mighty demon trapped in an unlikely body. The path ahead is not an easy one... Are you ready to do whatever it takes to regain your freedom?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are Not Yet final requirements. Future changes are very likely.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are Not Yet final requirements. Future changes are very likely.
